edu.cs495.engine.gfx.obj.filters

Class AbstractFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cs495.engine.gfx.obj.filters.AbstractFilter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlphaFilter, ColorReplacementFilter, ColorSwapFilter, RotationFilter, TotalColorFilter

    public abstract class AbstractFilter
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract image filter. Filters are applied to Images which will change the literal pixels of the image at runtime. If you desire to filter a sprite in a sprite sheet, you'll need to convert the specific sprite to the Image type and pass it to setImage(Image)
    Version:
    February 2019
    Author:
    Spencer Imbleau
